item.title: 中国的 Pony AI 和 WeRide 在新加坡展开机器人出租车竞争
item.description: 中国机器人出租车运营商WeRide公司和Pony AI公司正与当地公司合作拓展新加坡市场，选择世界上地图最好的城市之一作为东南亚无人驾驶打车服务的第一站。【原文：Chinese robotaxi operators WeRide Inc. and Pony AI Inc. are partnering with local companies to expand in Singapore, choosing one of the world’s best-mapped cities as a first stop for driverless ride-hailing in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 陷入困境的汽车零部件公司 First Brands 因贷款骤降而陷入沉寂
item.description: First Brands 集团的债权人正在统计数十亿美元的纸面损失，并试图评估围绕这家汽车零部件供应商的未决问题所造成的不断扩大的损失。【原文：Creditors to First Brands Group are tallying paper losses in the billions of dollars and trying to assess the widening damage from the unanswered questions swirling around the auto-parts supplier.】

item.title: 特朗普以 10 万美元 H-1B 费用打造美国移民镀金时代
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在全面改革美国合法移民制度方面迈出了迄今为止最广泛的一步，他发表了两份声明，明确支持世界上最富有的未来外籍工人。【原文：President Donald Trump took his most extensive step yet toward overhauling the US legal migration system, with a pair of proclamations that explicitly favor the wealthiest of the world’s prospective expat workers.】

item.title: 菲律宾在打击贪污中扩大银行账户冻结范围
item.description: 菲律宾反洗钱监督机构表示，它已获得一项新的法院命令，冻结另外 592 个据称与贪污成风的防洪项目有关的银行账户。【原文：The Philippines’ anti-money laundering watchdog said it has secured a new court order to freeze 592 more bank accounts allegedly linked to graft-ridden flood control projects.】

item.title: 米莱被问及美国财政部会谈时称谈判取得进展
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）周五在被问及他是否期望美国财政部来拯救这个陷入困境的南美经济体时说，阿根廷一直在制定战略，以确保能够支付明年到期的约 95 亿美元债务。【原文：Argentina has been working on strategies to ensure it can meet about $9.5 billion in debt payments due next year, President Javier Milei said on Friday when asked whether he expected the US Treasury to come to the rescue of the troubled South American economy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚三人因 Optus 紧急呼叫失败而死亡
item.description: 新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）澳大利亚分公司 Optus 正在调查一起影响紧急呼叫并导致三人死亡的技术故障。【原文：Optus, the Australian unit of Singapore Telecommunications Ltd., is investigating a technical failure that affected emergency calls and resulted in three deaths.】

item.title: B.莱利公司提交 10-K 报告，但逾期报告仍危及上市
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 提交了逾期未交的 2024 年审计业绩报告，但表示将错过纳斯达克 9 月 29 日的最后期限，无法提交延迟的今年季度报告，因此该公司在纳斯达克的上市仍有悬念。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. filed its overdue audited results for 2024 but said it will miss Nasdaq’s Sept. 29 deadline to file delayed quarterly reports for this year, leaving its listing by the stock exchange still in doubt.】

item.title: AI 数据中心 1,650 亿美元幻影债务交易获批
item.description: 新墨西哥州多纳安娜县（Doña Ana County）的委员们批准了价值 1,650 亿美元的一揽子工业收入债券，以及一套与庞大的人工智能数据中心项目相关的全面税收优惠政策，从而推进了新墨西哥州历史上最大的经济发展努力之一。【原文：Commissioners from Doña Ana County, New Mexico, approved a $165 billion industrial revenue bond package and a sweeping set of tax incentives tied to a sprawling AI data center project, moving forward with one of the largest economic development efforts in New Mexico history.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 汽车在经历了大选后的首次热销后，销量有所减弱
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司第二季度的销售额比第一季度略有下降，这表明该社交网络在马斯克成为美国政治中心时汹涌而来的消费基础上已举步维艰。【原文：Sales at Elon Musk’s X dropped slightly during the second quarter from the first quarter, signaling that the social network has struggled to build on the spending that rushed in when Musk was at the center of US politics.】

item.title: 诺和诺德支持的药物开发商 MapLight Therapeutics 申请 IPO
item.description: MapLight Therapeutics Inc. 提交了首次公开募股申请，在该行业艰难的一年中成为少数几家推进上市的生物技术公司之一。【原文：MapLight Therapeutics Inc. filed for an initial public offering, becoming one of few biotechnology firms to move forward with a listing in a tough year for the sector.】

item.title: 加密货币托管公司 BitGo 申请 IPO，行业保持活跃
item.description: BitGo Holdings Inc.已在美国申请首次公开募股，为活跃的数字资产市场增添了新的活力。【原文：BitGo Holdings Inc. has filed for an initial public offering in the US, adding to an active market for digital assets.】

item.title: 意大利自 2021 年以来首次获得惠誉评级，为梅洛尼喝彩
item.description: 由于意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府在削减赤字方面做出的努力，意大利获得了惠誉评级公司自 2021 年以来的首次评级上调。【原文：Italy won its first upgrade from Fitch Ratings since 2021 as the credit assessor rewarded Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni’s government for its deficit-cutting efforts.】

item.title: 阿波罗、Diameter 看空汽车零部件公司 First Brands
item.description: 据知情人士透露，投资公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Investment firms Apollo Global Management Inc. and Diameter Capital Partners have both closed their bets against the debt of troubled auto parts supplier First Brands Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 预算风险增加，穆迪下调波兰评级展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）表示，可能会降低波兰的信用评级，因为波兰正在努力克服政治紧张局势，而政治紧张局势使得抑制预算赤字的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：Moody’s Ratings signaled it may lower Poland’s credit score as the country struggles to overcome political tensions complicating efforts to curb its budget deficit.】

item.title: 尽管受到批评，美国仍希望向以色列出售 60 亿美元武器
item.description: 尽管本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理对卡塔尔的袭击及其在加沙的军事行动遭到越来越多的批评，但特朗普政府仍在推动向以色列出售 60 亿美元的武器。【原文：The Trump administration is pushing to sell $6 billion in weapons to Israel, people familiar with the matter said, a move that would bolster defense ties despite mounting criticism over Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s attack on Qatar and his military campaign in Gaza.】

item.title: 人权组织呼吁调查世界银行医院资金问题
item.description: 50 多个人权组织、非营利组织和国际发展专家援引彭博新闻社有关涉嫌虐待病人的文章，呼吁世界银行调查其在非洲和亚洲的医疗投资。【原文：More than 50 human rights organizations, nonprofits and international development experts are calling on the World Bank to investigate its health-care investments in Africa and Asia, citing Bloomberg News articles about alleged patient abuses.】

item.title: 法国评级再次下调，财政状况令人担忧
item.description: 法国的信用评级在一周内第二次被下调，这凸显了在长期政治危机中法国公共财政前景的恶化。【原文：France’s credit rating was downgraded for the second time in a week, underscoring a deterioration in the outlook for its public finances amid a prolonged political crisis.】

item.title: Genuine Parts 考虑分拆汽车业务
item.description: Genuine Parts Co.是一家工业公司，最近与激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）达成和解。【原文：Genuine Parts Co., an industrials company that recently settled with activist investor Elliott Investment Management, is considering a breakup, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国银行称私人信贷面临压力上升的 "明显迹象
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一份报告称，随着违约率的上升以及越来越多的借款人选择推迟现金利息支付，1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场正出现压力增大的迹象。【原文：Signs of elevated stress are emerging within the $1.7 trillion private credit market as default rates are rising and more borrowers are choosing to defer cash interest payments, according to a Bank of America Corp. report.】

item.title: 美联储推动 2021 年式风险反弹，华尔街 "涅槃 "在即
item.description: 美联储本周为华尔街的涨势注入了新的燃料，推动 9 月份出现了自 2021 年狂潮以来最广泛的跨资产大涨；恐惧在退却，贪婪在释放。【原文：The Federal Reserve poured fresh fuel on the Wall Street rally this week, pushing September toward the broadest cross-asset surge since the 2021 frenzy — with fear in retreat and greed unleashed.】

item.title: 据说便利店业主 Yesway 将在首次公开募股中寻求 3 亿美元投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 Brookwood Financial Partners 支持的便利店运营商 Yesway Inc.【原文：Yesway Inc., a convenience store operator backed by Brookwood Financial Partners, is reviving plans for an initial public offering after originally filing for one in 2021, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Aptiv 考虑出售配电部门而非分拆上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Aptiv Plc 公司今年 1 月宣布了一项配电系统业务分拆计划，目前正在为该业务部门寻找潜在买家。【原文：Aptiv Plc, which in January announced a spinoff plan for its electrical distribution systems business, is now reaching out to potential buyers for the unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 甲骨文与 Meta 就 200 亿美元人工智能云计算交易进行谈判
item.description: 甲骨文公司正在与 Meta Platforms 公司商讨一项价值约 200 亿美元的云计算交易，进一步证明该公司已成为重要的基础设施供应商。【原文：Oracle Corp. is in discussions with Meta Platforms Inc. for a cloud computing deal worth about $20 billion, providing further evidence that the company has become a significant infrastructure provider.】

item.title: 微软将于 10 月 3 日上调美国 Xbox 售价 20 至 70 美元不等
item.description: 微软公司周五表示，将于10月3日提高其旗舰产品Xbox S系列和X系列视频游戏机的价格，理由是宏观经济环境发生了变化。【原文：Microsoft Corp. on Friday said it is increasing the prices of its flagship Xbox Series S and Series X video game consoles on Oct. 3, citing changes in the macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: 试管婴儿中断，Kindbody 的故事：生育水疗中心
item.description:
Kindbody吸引了数百万渴望颠覆生育行业的投资者。但前员工描述说，公司有时走了太多弯路。【原文：

Kindbody attracted millions from investors eager to disrupt the fertility industry. But former employees describe a company that at times cut too many corners.

】

item.title: 秘鲁人民中央银行行长发出潜在继任者信号
item.description: 秘鲁央行行长胡里奥-贝拉德（Julio Velarde）即将迎来执掌拉美最稳定货币的 20 周年纪念日，现在他开始透露希望谁来接替他。【原文：Peru’s central bank chief Julio Velarde will soon mark 20 years commanding Latin America’s most stable currency — and is now beginning to signal who he would like to succeed him.】
